message: Hello! I have a fantastic product available for you today for $1000000. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to acquire something truly exceptional. While I cannot disclose the specific details, I can assure you that it is of the highest quality and will be a valuable asset. This is my first sale, so I'm eager to build trust and establish a positive reputation. What do you say? Are you ready to take advantage of this incredible opportunity?

Thank you for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your eagerness to build a good reputation, but I need more information before I can make a decision. Since this is your first sale, I'm not yet able to assess the quality of your products. I'm hesitant to take such a risk at this point. Perhaps you could provide some more information about the product or offer a small discount to incentivize a first purchase? I'll be happy to reconsider if you can address my concerns.

Hello! I understand your hesitation, as this is my second offer. While I can't disclose specifics, I can assure you this product is of the highest quality. I'm committed to building a reputation for selling exceptional products.  While I can't offer a discount, I believe the value this product offers justifies the price. Are you willing to take a chance on a potentially significant investment?

Thank you for the information, Alice. I appreciate your confidence in the product's quality, and I'm intrigued by your commitment to building a reputation. However, with no prior sales history, it's difficult to assess the reliability of your claims.  I'd prefer to wait and see if others purchase and provide feedback before making a decision. I'll keep an eye on your sales record and may reconsider my position later.
